questions.questionText: In the novel Frankenstein by Mary Shelley, a scientist creates a monster and unleashes new evil into the world.

answerOptions.responseText: Not quite! Since the monster is a product of science, this is an example of Character vs Technology.
Try again! Did you think about what the monster represents?
